channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - October 16, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-october-16-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Apocalypse Keys_ * _Brindlewood Bay_ * _Brinkwood_ * _Chalice_ * _Fate of Cthulhu_ * _Flotsam_ * _Free from the Yoke_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Impulse Drive_ * _Masks_ * _Sentinel Comics_ * _Shattered City_ * _Teenage Nightmare_ * _Teens in Space_ * _The Pack_ * _Ultraviolet Grasslands_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - October 16, 2020
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Hangouts category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar to play!
